A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Depending on what you're expectations for this film were it can be described as either a beautifully shot and wonderfully philosophical picture or the beginning of the end of the franchise. Some have strongly criticized Luke's treatment within the film however I believe that luke still represents hope although the hope he represents is of a different nature. The hope that Luke represents is finding peace and purpose within yourself after facing debilitating remorse and depression related to failure. I feel that people's expectations interfered with their enjoyment of the film. Watch or rewatch without expectations to get the most out of this film.
